title:
Integrable and superintegrable quantum mechanical systems with position
  dependent masses invariant with respect to one parametric Lie groups. 2.
  Systems with dilatation and shift symmetries
abstract:
3d quantum mechanical systems with position dependent masses (PDM) admitting
at least one second order integral of motion and symmetries with respect to
dilatation or shift transformations are classified. Twenty-seven such systems
are specified and the completeness of the classification results is proved.
